import React, {useState} from 'react' import LockIn from './pages/settask' import FocusGame from './pages/game' import Header from './reusable_components/header/header' import Footer from './reusable_components/footer/footer' import {Route, Routes, Router } from 'react-router' import HomePage from './pages/homepage' import LoginPage from './pages/login/login' import SignupPage from './pages/signup/signup' import Dashboard from './pages/dashboard/dashboard' import './app.css' const App = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const handleSignup = (newUser) => { setUser(newUser); // Save the signed-up user in state localStorage.setItem("newUser", JSON.stringify(newUser)); // Save to localStorage }; return (
} /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> {/*
*/}
) } export default App
